EmailTemplate.subject: PA13-012 - VisiNet Command 4.5.10 Patch 12 Release Notes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Product Announcement PA13-012 – VisiNet Command 4.5.10 Patch 12 Release Notes POSTED: 04-16-13
Dear Clients,
The Product Announcement, PA13-012 - VisiNet Command 4.5.10 Patch 12 Release Notes <https://na6.salesforce.com/articles/Release_Notes/Command-4-5-10-Patch-12-Release-Notes?popup=true> has been posted to the Support site.
You may access this release note by logging into the Salesforce site and search under Articles or by clicking on the link <https://na6.salesforce.com/articles/Release_Notes/Command-4-5-10-Patch-12-Release-Notes?popup=true> included on this e-mail.
Sincerely,
Shane Birch Technical Support Supervisor – 911/Inform (VisiNet) | Decorah, IA TriTech Software Systems | www.tritech.com <tritech.com>
Support Website: Salesforce.com <https://na6.salesforce.com/secur/login_portal.jsp?orgId=00D80000000arem&portalId=06080000000QwMW>
